infoCards.title: Iran's Economic Transformation
infoCards.subTitle: The Beginning of a New Era of Development and a Glorious Global Position
infoCards.desc: Emkan is a platform for balanced development, targeted investment, and redefining Iran's position in the global value chain. With transformative strategies, advanced infrastructure, and international collaborations, we are building a sustainable future for Iran. A future where Iran will be one of the leading economic powers in the region and the world.

infoCards.title: Territorial Development
infoCards.subTitle: Our Mission for Iran's Future: A Path Toward Sustainable Development
infoCards.desc: The future of Iran will be built through balanced and sustainable development. At Emkan, we focus on the Makran coast, free zones, and Iranian islands, creating infrastructure that will drive the national economy. This is not just a project but a strategy to distribute opportunities, attract investment, and establish new economic hubs.

infoCards.title: Economic Leadership
infoCards.subTitle: Iran's Path to Becoming One of the Top 10 Global Economic Powers
infoCards.desc: Iran is ready for economic transformation. At Emkan, we are redefining the country's economic position through modern investment, development of free zones, and integration into the global value chain. Diversifying the economy and reducing dependence on oil are our paths to a sustainable future.

infoCards.btnTitle: Learn more about Shaping the Future
infoCards.title: Shaping the Future
infoCards.subTitle: Architecting Iran's Tomorrow on the Path of Progress and Transformation
infoCards.desc: At Emkan, we design and guide the future. By focusing on innovation, digitalization, and the development of smart cities, we shape Iran's path to growth and competitiveness. Empowering the new generation, strengthening the entrepreneurial ecosystem, and building sustainable infrastructure are our visions for a progressive and leading future.

infoCards.title: Civilization Building
infoCards.subTitle: From a Glorious Past to a Powerful Future for Iran
infoCards.desc: Civilization building is a strategic process rooted in the history and identity of a nation. At Emkan, we guide Iran's civilization toward a bright future through innovation, economic progress, and cultural cohesion. The future Iran will be an advanced and powerful player on the global stage.
